description:
Do you really want to learn how to use Photoshop? This course for you. Learn how to make various project today using Photoshop!

There are different courses available already in the market but these are too lengthy & uninteresting, here in this course I have covered very essential concepts in Photoshop, I have tried to cover every basic concept which you must know while using Photoshop. This Photoshop course is created from student point of view.

Learn Photoshop in 1 Hour course is practically project & example based, Useless stuffs are not included in it. Once you done with the course it will be beneficial for you to get multimedia job.

Once you take this course you will get Lifetime Access to this Photoshop course, You need to pay only once.

What are you going to learn through this Photoshop course?

- Over 12 lectures and 1 hour of Photoshop content.

- Practical Photoshop examples.

- Learn to beautify your own image using Photoshop.

- Learn to Change background using Photoshop.

- Learn to convert your coloured image to Black n White using Photoshop.

- Leaning of all important tools in Photoshop.

Which are the benefits of learning online?

Basically Online Learning is the easiest way of learning things. There are plenty of benefits of learning online includes :

- Student can learn from anywhere irrespective of it’s location.

- Student Learn it from his/her own computer or mobile or tablet device.

- Online education allows for the attendance of class wherever the student has access to the Internet. Online learning is, in many cases, available 24 hours a day and seven days a week, so the student can participate in class whenever it's most convenient.

- Students also save money as online courses are in low price.

- An independent approach to distance learning teaches the student to be a more effective time manager. With online learning, a student may develop the technological skills needed in their future careers.

- Online Learning provides Variety of programs and courses at same place.

What are the basic requirements?

- You need to have Photoshop installed on your computer.

- Internet Connection.

What is the target audience?

- Complete beginners.

- For College Students.

- Interested in Photoshop.

- Photoshop student.

How long will this Photoshop course take to complete ?

- It will take just 1 hour to learn Photoshop.

Why to take this Photoshop course?

- To have basic knowledge about Photoshop & it’s tools
title: Learn Photoshop in 1 Hour
